data.title: Learning and Safety Abroad
data.meta_site_name: U of T - Learning and Safety Abroad
data.text:
Aoyama Gakuin University (AGU) was founded in 1949 as part of Aoyama Gakuin, which was established in 1874 will be celebrating its institutional foundation’s 150th anniversary in 2024. AGU has established a national reputation for the quality of its teaching and its international ambience and is widely recognized as one of the leading private universities […]

Read More… from Exchange: Aoyama Gakuin University

Aix-Marseille University (AMU) is the largest multidisciplinary university in the French-speaking world, with 80,000 students. It has 5 major campuses and a presence in 9 different cities. Though its current iteration is one of the youngest universities in France, the Aix-Marseille university dates back to the1400’s. It offers a large variety of quality education in […]

Read More… from Exchange: Aix-Marseille University

Freie Universität Berlin is an outstanding, future-oriented institution in Germany’s renowned academic landscape. Repeatedly selected as one of the country’s Universities of Excellence, it boasts an acclaimed international orientation, interdisciplinary approach, and commitment to social responsibility. The university offers a comprehensive range of studies and highly competitive programs at all academic levels. While it enjoys […]

Read More… from Exchange: Free University of Berlin

Instituto Tecnológico Autónomo de México (ITAM) undergraduate programs offer internationally rigorous research and academic standards which attract the most competitive students and professors in Mexico. ITAM offers undergraduate degrees in Accounting, Actuarial Science, Applied Mathematics, Business Administration, Computer Engineering, Economics, Financial Management, Industrial Engineering, International Relations, Law, Mechatronics Engineering, Political Science, and Telecommunications Engineering. Credit […]

Read More… from Exchange: Instituto Tecnológico Autónomo de México (ITAM)

For more than a century, the College has been a leader in pharmacy education, practice, and research. The U.S. News and World Report magazine recently ranked the College as one of the top 20 pharmacy schools in the nation. Student pharmacists receive an exceptional education because of the excellence of faculty, staff, student services, curriculum […]

Read More… from Exchange: University of Tennessee College of Pharmacy

The RNCM is a leading international conservatoire located in the heart of Manchester, with a reputation for attracting talented students, teachers, conductors, and composers from all over the world. Complementing this role, the RNCM is also a vibrant live music venue offering unparalleled opportunities for students to perform regularly to public audiences and to work […]

Read More… from Exchange: Royal Northern College of Music

Founded in 1425, KU Leuven is among the top 100 universities globally, with all its disciplines in the top 100 of their respective fields as well. KU Leuven believes in research-based education, lectures are taught by the same professors who are performing ground-breaking research as seen in the press. KU Leuven is the cofounder of […]

Read More… from Exchange: KU Leuven

Mozarteum University Salzburg is one of the top universities in Austria, and the only university that combines music, performing arts and fine arts. It was established in honor of the great Salzburg-born musician Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. Mozarteum University is in the culturally rich city of Salzburg, often referred to as the “City of Mozart” and […]

Read More… from Exchange: Mozarteum University Salzburg

The University of Mannheim is well known for its distinct profile, business orientation, and international approach. Mannheim’s renowned Economics and Social Sciences Programs are closely intertwined with Humanities, Law, Mathematics, and Computer Sciences. The University of Mannheim is mainly located in Mannheim Palace, the largest baroque palace in Germany. The university is consistently ranked among […]

Read More… from Exchange: University of Mannheim

Based on the European side of the Bosphorus Strait in Istanbul, Türkiye, Boğaziçi University is consistently ranked among the top 500 universities globally. The university, established in 1971, continues the legacy of Robert College, the first American higher education institution founded outside the U.S. This heritage ensures that English is the primary language of instruction, […]

Read More… from Exchange: Bogazici University
